  • Graduate Lecturer:
    Lead a graduate course (FQ-292: Quantum Molecular Dynamics) outlining the theory and application of modern quantum molecular dynamics techniques.

Texas Tech University

Lubbock, TX
  • ScalIT Training Course:
    Created and lead a course for training scientists to use ScalIT, a massively parallel exact quantum dynamics software suite.
